isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Crankcase, Crankshaft, Connecting Rods, And Pistons - Crankshaft and Main Bearings - Cleaning

step1.para: Clean the crankshaft with a suitable solvent. Dry the crankshaft with filtered compressed air.

Use a stiff nylon brush to clean all of the internal oil passages of the crankshaft. Loosen all dirt, sludge, and other deposits that may have accumulated. Flush the oil passages with a suitable non-caustic solvent. Dry the oil passages with filtered compressed air.
Clean the bearing caps and inserts thoroughly in solvent. Dry with filtered compressed air.
